alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 30 at 3:20AM CST until January 31 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST /10 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM MST /10 AM CST/ this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon to 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
